trans-unit.source: Provides panels on each side of the form and a central panel that can hold one or more controls.
<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> is similar to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.

It uses four docked side panels (instances of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>) and one central panel (an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>) to create a typical arrangement.
trans-unit.target: 它使用四个停靠的侧面板 (的实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>) 和一个中间面板 (实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>) 若要创建典型的排列方式。

trans-unit.source: You cannot remove the side panels, but you can hide them by setting their respective <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.TopToolStripPanelVisible%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.BottomToolStripPanelVisible%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.LeftToolStripPanelVisible%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.RightToolStripPanelVisible%2A> properties to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 无法删除侧面板中，但您可以通过设置各自隐藏它们<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.TopToolStripPanelVisible%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.BottomToolStripPanelVisible%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.LeftToolStripPanelVisible%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.RightToolStripPanelVisible%2A>属性设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: By default, each of these properties is `true` at design time.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，上述每个属性是`true`在设计时。

trans-unit.source: Also at design time, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> appears with its top panel already expanded.
trans-unit.target: 在设计时，还<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>与尚未展开其顶部面板一起显示。

trans-unit.source: You can neither remove nor hide the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>.

You can arrange one or more <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controls in the side panels, and you can use the central panel for other controls.
trans-unit.target: 一个或多个可以排列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>控件在侧面板中，并且你可以将其他控件使用中间面板。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel> also provides a way to get renderer support into the body of your form for a consistent appearance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>还使您能够获取到一致的外观窗体的正文的呈现器的支持。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> does not support Multiple Document Interface (MDI) applications.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> 不支持多文档界面 (MDI) 应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> for MDI applications.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>对于 MDI 应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates adding a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> to a Windows Forms, adding items to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, and adding the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.TopToolStripPanel%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>向 Windows 窗体，将项添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>，并将添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.TopToolStripPanel%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
This event is not relevant for this class.
This event is not relevant for this class.
Gets the bottom panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> representing the bottom panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.

Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.BottomToolStripPanel%2A> property to add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controls or move them from another <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.BottomToolStripPanel%2A>属性来添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>控制或将它们移从另一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the bottom panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> is visible.
<see langword="true" /> if the bottom panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> is visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果的底部面板<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />可见; 否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.BottomToolStripPanelVisible%2A> property to `false` to use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> without a bottom panel.
This property is not relevant for this class.
<see langword="true" /> if the control causes validation; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果控件引起验证，则为否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.CausesValidation" /> property changes.
For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the center panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel" /> representing the center panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.

You can use the top, bottom, left, and right panels of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> to hold <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controls.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用顶部、 底部、 左侧和右侧面板的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>来保存<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>控件。

trans-unit.source: Controls other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> are automatically added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>.
This property is not relevant for this class.
The ContextMenuStrip associated with this control.
This property is not relevant for this class.
Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.ContextMenuStrip" /> property changes.
For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
The collection of controls contained within the control.
trans-unit.target: 包含在控件内的控件的集合。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
Creates and returns a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> collection.
A read-only <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> collection.
This property is not relevant for this class.
The cursor that is displayed when the mouse pointer is over the control.
trans-unit.target: 当鼠标指针放置在控件上时显示的光标。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
This event is not relevant for this class.
This event is not relevant for this class.
Gets the default size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />, in pixels.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> representing the horizontal and vertical dimensions of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />表示的水平和垂直尺寸<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />，以像素为单位。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
The foreground color of the control.
This property is not relevant for this class.
This event is not relevant for this class.
This event is not relevant for this class.
Gets the left panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> representing the left panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.

Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.LeftToolStripPanel%2A> property to add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controls or move them from another <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.LeftToolStripPanel%2A>属性来添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>控制或将它们移从另一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the left panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> is visible.
<see langword="true" /> if the left panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> is visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果左的面板中的<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />可见; 否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.LeftToolStripPanelVisible%2A> property to `false` to use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> without a left panel.
The event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeftChanged" /> event.
An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged" /> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.OnSizeChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.OnSizeChanged%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.OnSizeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.OnSizeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.OnSizeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 时，一定要调用基类的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.OnSizeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: Gets the right panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> representing the right panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.

Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.RightToolStripPanel%2A> property to add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controls or move them from another <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.RightToolStripPanel%2A>属性来添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>控制或将它们移从另一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the right panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> is visible.
<see langword="true" /> if the right panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> is visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果的右面板<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />可见; 否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.RightToolStripPanelVisible%2A> property to `false` to use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> without a right panel.
Gets the top panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> representing the top panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.

Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.TopToolStripPanel%2A> property to add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controls or move them from another <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.TopToolStripPanel%2A>属性来添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>控制或将它们移从另一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the top panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> is visible.
<see langword="true" /> if the top panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> is visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果的顶部面板<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />可见; 否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.TopToolStripPanelVisible%2A> property to `false` to use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> without a top panel.
